title: 106_hr4774
content: Grants right of first refusal to purchase the Bend Pine Nursery to the Bend Metro Parks and Recreation District in Deschutes County, Oregon. Makes the proceeds from any such sale available to the Secretary without further appropriations Act for: (1) acquisition, construction, or improvement of administrative and visitor facilities and land in connection with the Deschutes National Forest. (2) construction of a bunkhouse facility in the Umatilla National Forest. And (3) acquisition of land in Oregon. Authorizes the Secretary to use such proceeds or other funds subsequently made available to acquire, construct, or improve such facilities. Authorizes appropriations.
